tutorials.title: Prerequesites
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the steps to register a free tier account on OCI.

tutorials.title: Introduction to the workshop
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to the workshop, the topic of deepfake and the faceswap application.
tutorials.filename: ./Introduction to the workshop/Introduction to the workshop.md

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create SSH keys
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional steps to create SSH keys that you will need to connect to your compute instance.
tutorials.filename: ./Lab 1 - Create SSH keys/Lab 1 - Create SSH keys.md

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Lab 2 - Provision a GPU instance
tutorials.description: This lab you through the required and optional steps to launch a GPU instance on OCI .
tutorials.filename: ./Lab 2 - Provision a GPU instance/Lab 2 - Provision a GPU instance.md

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Run Faceswap
tutorials.description: This lab you through the required and optional steps to run Faceswap (extract data, train & convert model, generate deepfake) .
